title: IPC protocol and versioning
description: Define request/response envelope, protocol version checks, and error contracts for client-daemon communication.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Drafted IPC protocol doc in docs/IPC_PROTOCOL.md and added to mkdocs nav. Defines envelope, versioning rules, and error contract for enforcement.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter

custom.beads_acceptance_criteria: Protocol schema and compatibility checks are documented and enforceable in Python and Rust.
